name: Oracle of Colliding Realms
description:
Collect the gems from the layers of the levels!

A new layer is brought in every 10 seconds!

You can see a small preview of the layer approaching.

Cursor keys to move. Space or up arrow is jump. Down speeds up time.

Level 2 unlocks double jump, just press jump button again in the air. 

Level 3 unlocks dash, use SHIFT key to dash forward.

Each level has three layers. Notice that some levels cannot be completed in a single cycle!

Code by hunttis, MikroPiru, Frenchbread
Graphics by Hannah_Noon
Music by Miigii
